availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Native of Sussex, England. Married to Sarah J. Shanks Dunstall. Farm laborer in Kenton County in 1850. Farm laborer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 145B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 674
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #252411, p. 48
Find A Grave, "William S. Dunstall (1837-1912)," Memorial #32468080, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32468080 (accessed October 11, 2019).
